Title: Provides sales and use tax exemption for services rendered for the maintenance of certain trucks
Summary: Exempts services rendered with respect to the maintenance and repair of trucks having a gross weight exceeding 33,000 pounds from the state portion of the sales and compensating use tax.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the tax law, in relation to sales and use tax exemption for services rendered with respect to the maintenance and repair of trucks having a gross weight exceeding 33,000 pounds
